page.title: 01General Description
page.content: The area of our D _ Block covers{North {Anston, Dinnington, Woodsetts, {Gildingwells}and{Letwell.}Woodsetts, Gildingwells and Letwell are mostly {farmland,}whilst the areas of North Anston and Dinnington are mainly covered with modern houses.The area is built on stone which is {Permian Magnesia Limestone.}The only river in the area is{Anston Brook (Stones Dyke) which runs south_east joining the River Trent and finally discharging into the Humber.There are many{tributaries}running into this river from Dinnington and Laughton. There is lots of{wildlife}around our D _ Block and that is what gives the interesting,exciting atmosphere as you walk through the countryside, {particularly near Letwell and {Gildingwells.}There are many bridle paths,small lanes and woods with trees
